ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name ='AVO Withdrawal LOC Review', ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Status__c ,'Approved'), AVO_AG_SW_Pump_Information_Form__c = false, AVO_Ag_Well_Data_form__c = false, AVO_Consolidated_Conservation_Plan__c = false, AVO_Flow_Meter_Approval_Form__c =false, Irrigation_Efficiency_Certification_Form__c =false, AVO_Low_Flow_Guidance__c =false, AVO_Well_Pad_Requirement__c =false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please indicate which of the LOC forms are required
